description:

fucking him from behind. Buff reaches around and tweaks Ruff’s nipples as the
bottom jacks off while getting rammed. Buff then dumps his load on the bottom’s ass,
a kiss and a punch to the chest ending the memorable encounter.
title: ABUSE OF POWER: Tony Buff with Ruff Zindao
